title: Agate Fossil Beds National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Kids & Youth          National Parks and Monuments protect many different historic, cultural and scenic areas all over the country and many of these have Junior Ranger programs. There is also a Junior Ranger website where you can become a WebRanger and earn the official WebRanger patch. Go to www.nps.gov/webrangers and start having fun, set up your ranger station and you'll be ready to explore. Junior Ranger Day is included in National Park Week in April, get in free to all 407 parks during the first weekend of National Park Week and take advantage of special events in these parks.  Use nps.gov to help plan your visit to an old favorite or find a new one.
